title: Who are some K-pop idols with personal YouTube channels? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jae (Day6) - JaeSix & yellowpostitman (Predebut) Coco (CocoSori) - Rilaccoco Sorn (CLC) - PRODUSORN Amber (f(x)) - Amber Liu Baekhyun (EXO) - 백현 Baekhyun Chanyeol (EXO) - CY Park Chen (EXO) - CHEN Somin (KARD) - Minny J 소민 N (VIXX) - achahakyeon Luna (f(x)) - Luna's Alphabet루나의 알파벳 Solar (MAMAMOO) - 솔라시도 solarsido Peniel (BTOB) - POV Song (iKON) - 송슐랭 가이드 - SONGCHELIN GUIDE Jaehyun & Hun (N.Flying) - 두얼간이 2IDIOTS Taeyeon (SNSD) - 탱구TV Heechul (Super Junior) - HEEtube 김희철 Bomi (Apink) - 뽐뽐뽐 Sakura (IZ*ONE) - ちゃんねる宮脇咲良 Chan (iKON) - 찬우살이 Suhyun (AKMU) - Mochipeach Lisa (Blackpink) - Lilifilm Official Hweseung (N.Flying) - 유회승 Yoo Hwe Seung Minhwan (FT island) - 미나리TV / ChoiMinHwan Woosung (The Rose) - iwoosung

Some that I think weren’t mentioned are: f(x)’s Luna (Luna’s Alphabet): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC06v2Mqte9cfn-3SMwpvFUA she uploads a lot, it’s mostly a lifestyle type of channel, she covers thing like diets, practicing, how she prepares for concerts, albums, festivals, stuff like that gugudan’s Hana: 보보TV_hana she started not long ago! I think this is the most personal one, she uploaded 5 vlogs so far <3 VIXX’s Hongbin, he has been doing gameplays for a while now, he started on Twitch, but he has a youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtl1BsH_JKGYspPxUx8zRvw (he’s probably one the best idol gamers from what I understand :) )
